biography: The Salvador Zubirán National Institute of Health Sciences and Nutrition is one of the twelve national institutes that belong to the Mexican Secretariat of Health. Its main functions and services include medical research, specialized medical attention and health education for future professionals. It is located in the Tlalpan borough in the south of Mexico City where the main hospitals in the city are located. David Kershenobich Stalnikowitz currently manages the institute.
aiSummary: Salvador Zubirán is a internal medicine specialist with an H-index of 37 at National Institute of Nutrition (Member). Has been published in Nature Medicine, The Lancet Regional Health - Americas, Neurological Sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
